website_summaries.verdict: This bike is fun to ride and made by a name that most consumers trust. It's best for slow, relaxed cruising, and is a good choice for consumers who are looking for a low price on a leisure bike.
pros: An attractive bike by Huffy, a brand that's been recognized for generations
Offers a smooth ride and a seat that has comfortable padding
Coaster brakes are easy to use
Also comes in styles for women
cons: Advertised that it comes 90% assembled, but it's actually challenging to put together and comes with subpar instructions
Build is adequate, but not as durable as pricier options

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap and hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This came dinged and bent, but I went ahead and tried to assemble anyway. Two of the screws were not able to be removed, the tire protecter was not attaching correctly. I spent an hour on it, got nothing accomplished, put it back in its box and am returning it. Unless you are good at building stuff, buy one from a local store already assembled. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Moss

customer_reviews.title: The assembly took a while and the directions weren't that ...
customer_reviews.text: The assembly took a while and the directions weren't that helpful. Finally got it together and have everything tightened. Took it out for a ride after walking it to a gas station to fill up the tires and the seat wont stay at the set height. The screw is tightened sufficiently and it is locked in place, but with about 20 lbs of force i can push the seat down. Makes it VERY uncomfortable to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Graves

customer_reviews.title: this was not remotely "90%" assembled,
customer_reviews.text: this was promoted as "90% assembled" and there is NO MATHEMATICAL way possible it was even close to 90%, maybe 65%, but probably closer to 55% to 60% assembled would of been a much more candid and honest thing to claim on the description. It did not take a short and easy time to assembled, like the 90% was meant to lead you to believe, it took considerably longer. Also, the reflector was partially broke when I opened the package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Bike is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The bike was fairly simple to put together and I was able to do it within one hour (I'm 14). while putting it together i forgot to put in a screw and the whole brake assembly came out of the bike. But I immediately called huffy and received a whole wheel as a replacement. I don't understand why all these people are leaving negative reviews about their customer service. They took care of this error that i made free of charge. Great Job Huffy!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Pandolas

customer_reviews.title: Great value-light duty cruiser
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t a premium product but it’s a great value and really slick looking. For light riding it’s great. If you ride hard (jumping off curbs and generally cranking it hard) it will likely start falling apart over time. I hooked an”wee-ride” kids bike/trailer to it and it handles it great. Nice little rig.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Chote`

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass
customer_reviews.text: Cheap bikes... crappy craftsmanship. They work...but make a hell of a lot of noise doing it. Brakes are crap and honestly dangerous. We bought two of these unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: ReviewTime!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome so far.
customer_reviews.text: Use your own tools, follow the instructions, youll be golden. The thing looks fantastic in person and rides super smooth. I really love this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bike for this price category. Rides quiet and comfortably. Frame is heavy and solid. I did have to replace the front tire inner tub as it failed on the second day. Probably best to just look at the picture of the bike for assembly hints. The manual appears to be generic and does not match exactly this model. All of the features in the description matched with what I received. Its an attractive bike. I had another similar cruiser in he $185 range from another manufacturer that was not as good.
customer_reviews.author: Pogo

customer_reviews.title: BE VERY CAREFUL INSTALLING THE SEAT POST....IT CAN SLIDE INTO FRAME AND VERY DIFFICULT TO GET OUT!
customer_reviews.text: USING BIKE ON FLAT SURFACES TO BUILD UP MY LEGS AND WIND. * ON INSTILLATION NOTE THE DIRECTIONS WAS NOT IN THE BOX THAT SAID IT WAS IN...FOUND LAST MINUTE IN THE SEAT BOX. SO OPEN THAT FIRST. AND AGAIN BE CAREFUL WITH SEAT POST INSTALLATION IT NEEDS TO BE ATTACHED TO SEAT FIRST THEN INTO FRAME. Decent bike for the money however
customer_reviews.author: C J Black

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy for BURNING MAN: Ballbearings Broke After 1 Day of Use
customer_reviews.text: I was using this in the desert where there were dust storms. The sand got into the ball bearing and broke the bike after just ONE day. If you are in an urban environment that doesn't have dust and sand then you should be fine. But be wary if you are considering buying this for use where there's a lot of wind and dirt/sand.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel H. Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bicycle
customer_reviews.text: This product is made very well in every field. It was very easy to put together, requiring very few tools, it was a comfortable ride and it holds up very well. It's your simple, well made quality cruiser.
customer_reviews.author: Randon

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed. Paying full price for a bike I could have purchased from Walmart and having it delivered dented, scratched, and what looks like rusted. Oh man! Not a happy camper. :-( I hope I can get resolution with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: wanderlust obsession

customer_reviews.title: It's beautifully made but don't be surprised if some thing is missing!
customer_reviews.text: I would've given this bike five stars but it did not come with the screws for the rear fender. So now I have to find one and purchase it separately which will delay me from enjoying this good looking bike.
customer_reviews.author: JOVITO S WEEDON

customer_reviews.title: Check box was open at bottom
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars for shipping.very nice bike. But shipping company busted bike box open so there a whole in box and now I am missing screws. Unble to put bike together
customer_reviews.author: Regina McCall

customer_reviews.title: The bike come on time
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice bike but it have noses in the back rim I tried everything and it still don’t stop
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The bike is perfect, looks just like the picture. It took about 30 minutes to put together and it feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rizzoh

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, hard to return, get something else!
customer_reviews.text: The petals won’t thread onto the bike so I can’t ride it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage. Just got 26" mens bike yesterday. Fork stem broke very first time riding it. GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bike - Slightly Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Your agent did a great job of putting it together, but there were two big dents in the top of the rear fender. Your agent tried to pound them out enough so they wouldn't scrape the tire. I decided to keep the bike anyway because it would be too much trouble to repack it and return it. I guess I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a quick cardio workout. Came right away, and my husand put it together with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn S. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with brakes. I need brakes for the bike
customer_reviews.author: Graciela Scollo

customer_reviews.title: For  my 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old. It's not too heavy, rides smoothly and seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Desire

customer_reviews.title: Simple assembly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bike for my father-in-law who is in his 80's and facing two knee replacement surgery this year. It is basic, no switching gears or hand brakes. It was very simple for us to put together (took us less than an hour) and we had fun doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy E.

product_meta.title: Huffy Cruiser Bikes 20 inch, 24 inch & 26 inch
feature_bullets: Ideal for ages 13 and up and a minimum rider height of 5 feet; Huffy's exclusive Perfect Fit frame makes this the most comfortable bike you'll ever ride

This design delivers more comfort and that means more fun and a better ride; it places the seat farther back, with a lower center of gravity; this design, with swept-back handlebars, enables a more upright riding position with full leg extension

Generously padded for real comfort, the seat is stitched with red piping to accent the plush look; the Huffy logo is embroidered on the back for an elegant touch; dual springs add additional comfort as they absorb shock from bumps or uneven surfaces

Red pinstriped tires match the red accents on the chain guard and fenders; the rear coaster brake provides dependable control as you need it, just pedal back to stop; steel frame backed by our limited lifetime warranty (see owner's manual for details)

Dual density, two-toned Kraton grips provide a soft, comfortable feel to the contour of each hand; responsive pedals are light to the touch; for leisurely excursions around town and casual riding fun, the Huffy Fairmont delivers cool, fun style

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
